tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainability_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    water_usage FLOAT,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE urban_farming (
    farming_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farming_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    farming_area FLOAT,
    total_yield FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Urban_Farming_Reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    water_usage_id INT,
    carbon_footprint_id INT
);
